name: Pissu Kanna Run Fanmade Game
description:
Pissu Kanna Run Fanmade Game is a side-scrolling endless runner game that I made around 2020 using an android app called Pocket Code. I didn't complete the project. (cuz im too damn lazy and didn't knew how to code.) So this is just a early build of my game.

I don't recommend you to play this (cuz game is not fun).But if you really want to play it, download it below. <3
